title: Jennifer Garner shows off gym-toned arms as she and Ben Affleck pick up their kids from school
text:
They continue to do what is sometimes difficult for divorced parents with children; getting along.

And on Friday, Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck put their kids first as they stopped by to pick up son Samuel, seven, and Seraphina, 10, from school.

Jennifer looked fantastic with her gym-toned arms, which were front and center in a sleeveless, white blouse.

Parental duties: On Friday, Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck, both 47, put their kids first as they stopped by to pick up son Samuel, seven, and Seraphina, 10, from school

The mother-of-three tucked her cowl neck top into a pair of cropped, boot cut jeans. The 47-year-old completed her look with suede ankle boots and shades.

Ben, also 47, was casually dressed in a white T-shirt, a hoodie and jeans.

Samuel and Serpahina were dressed in their school uniforms, while Seraphina customized her look with stockings, socks and sneakers.

Stylish: The mother-of-three tucked her cowl neck top into a pair of cropped, boot cut jeans. Jennifer completed her look with suede ankle boots and shades

Not seen with the foursome on Friday was their eldest daughter, Violet, 13.

Ben and Jen married in June 2005 and officially divorced in October of last year.

Despite their split, the duo are on good terms and often pick up their children from school together, and attend church as a family.

Effortless: Ben was casually dressed in a white T-shirt, a hoodie and jeans

Jennifer has three projects in the works, including a TV series called, My Glory Was I Had Such Friends.

The Miracles From Heaven star will also appear in Yes Day and Fantasy Camp.

Meanwhile, Ben also has a slew of projects in the works.

He's set to produce, direct and star in a new version of Witness for the Prosecution and World War II drama Ghost Army.

The actor is also lined up to star in several movies including a Jay and Silent Bob Reboot and an as yet untitled sequel to 2016's The Accountant.
